inout.paths

Class PathHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • inout.paths.PathHandler

  • public class PathHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage all Path-objects created by a PathParser. Specific Paths can be accessed through a variety of methods collecting all Path with a shared trait or getPathsWithAttributes, which allows very detailed querys.
    Author:
    Dennis Ulmer

    • Method Detail

      • getFirstPathWithAttributes

        public Path getFirstPathWithAttributes(java.lang.String specification)
        Returns the first Path-object matching the specification. The specification must have the following format: (For an Indexing:) {raw / zipped} {default / binary / hexadecimal} {frequency / probability} indexing n {read / write} (For a Lexicon:) {raw / zipped} lexicon
        Parameters:
        specification -
        Returns:
        Path

      • getPathsWithAttributes

        public java.util.List<Path> getPathsWithAttributes(java.lang.String specification)
        Returns a List of Path-objects matching the specification. The specification must have the following format: (For an Indexing:) {raw / zipped} {default / binary / hexadecimal} {frequency / probability} indexing n {read / write} (For a Lexicon:) {raw / zipped} lexicon
        Parameters:
        specification -
        Returns:
        List of Path-objects

      • getPathsWithType

        public java.util.List<Path> getPathsWithType(java.lang.String type)
        Returns:
        A List of Path-objects with a certain type
